headline: The London Company Large Cap Strategy Increased its Stake in Old Dominion Freight Line (ODFL) on a Dip
summary: The London Company, an investment management company, released “The London Company Large Cap Strategy” first quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The US equities experienced a correction in the first quarter following two years of robust performance. The portfolio returned 2.4% (2.3%, net) during the quarter compared to […]
